item.title: K add a quote by Randy Pausch
item.description: "The key question to keep asking is, Are you spending your time on the right things? Because time is all you have. " -- Randy Pausch

item.title: K add a quote by Randy Pausch
item.description: "Showing gratitude is one of the simplest yet most powerful things humans can do for each other." -- Randy Pausch

item.title: K add a quote by Randy Pausch
item.description: "Luck is where preparation meets opportunity. " -- Randy Pausch

item.title: K add a quote by Randy Pausch
item.description: "The questions are always more important than the answers." -- Randy Pausch

item.title: K add a quote by Randy Pausch
item.description: "When we're connected to others, we become better people." -- Randy Pausch

item.title: K add a quote by Randy Pausch
item.description: "People are more important than things." -- Randy Pausch

item.title: K add a quote by Randy Pausch
item.description: "Give yourself permission to dream. Fuel your kids' dreams too. Once in a while, that might even mean letting them stay up past their bedtimes." -- Randy Pausch

item.title: K add a quote by Randy Pausch
item.description:
"No job is beneath you.
You ought to be thrilled you got a job in the mailroom And when you get there, here's what you do: Be really great at sorting mail. " -- Randy Pausch

item.title: K add a quote by Randy Pausch
item.description: "I know you're smart. But everyone here is smart. Smart isn't enough. The kind of people I want on my research team are those who will help everyone feel happy to be here. " -- Randy Pausch

item.title: K add a quote by Randy Pausch
item.description: "We've placed a lot of emphasis in this country on the idea of people's rights. That's how it should be, but it makes no sense to talk about rights without also talking about responsibilities." -- Randy Pausch

item.title: K add a quote by Randy Pausch
item.description: "Put on your own oxygen mask before assisting others." -- Randy Pausch

item.title: K add a quote by Randy Pausch
item.description: "If I work hard enough, there will be things I can do tomorrow that I can't do today." -- Randy Pausch

item.title: K add a quote by Randy Pausch
item.description: "There are more ways than one to measure profits and losses." -- Randy Pausch

item.title: K add a quote by Randy Pausch
item.description:
"I was hugely impressed... was the ultimate example of a man who knew what he didn't know, was perfectly willing to admit it, and didn't want to leave until he understood. That's heroic to me.
I wish every grad student had that attitude." -- Randy Pausch

item.title: K add a quote by Randy Pausch
item.description: "I've always admired people who are over-prepared." -- Randy Pausch

item.title: K add a quote by Randy Pausch
item.description: "Brick walls are there for a reason. They give us a chance to show how badly we want" -- Randy Pausch

item.title: K add a quote by Randy Pausch
item.description: "You've got to get the fundamentals down, because otherwise the fancy stuff is not going to work." -- Randy Pausch

item.title: K add a quote by Randy Pausch
item.description: "No job should, be beneath us. And if you can't(or won't) sort mail, Where is the proof that you can do anything?" -- Randy Pausch

item.title: K add a quote by Randy Pausch
item.description: "If you can find an opening, you can probably find a way to float through it." -- Randy Pausch

item.title: K add a quote by Randy Pausch
item.description: "Focus on other people, not on yourself." -- Randy Pausch

item.title: K add a quote by Randy Pausch
item.description: "Please don't die." -- Randy Pausch

item.title: K add a quote by Randy Pausch
item.description: "Experience is what you get when you didn't get what you wanted ." -- Randy Pausch

item.title: K add a quote by Randy Pausch
item.description: "Not everything needs to be fixed." -- Randy Pausch

item.title: K add a quote by Randy Pausch
item.description: "An injured lion wants to know if he can still roar." -- Randy Pausch

item.title: K add a quote by Randy Pausch
item.description: "And even though I did not reach the NFL, I sometimes think I got more from persuing that dream, and not accomplishing it, then I did from many of the ones I did accomplish." -- Randy Pausch

item.title: K add a quote by Randy Pausch
item.description: "Look for the best in everybody" -- Randy Pausch

item.title: K add a quote by Randy Pausch
item.description: "Your patience will be both appreciated and rewarded" -- Randy Pausch

item.title: K add a quote by Randy Pausch
item.description: "There's a lot of talk these days about giving children self-esteem. It's not something you can give; it's something they have to build." -- Randy Pausch

item.title: K add a quote by Randy Pausch
item.description: "The fact that fashion goes out of fashion and then comes back into fashion based solely on what a few people somewhere think they can sell, well to me, that’s insanity." -- Randy Pausch

item.title: K add a quote by Randy Pausch
item.description: "Just because you're in the driver's seat, doesn't mean you have to run people over." -- Randy Pausch
